title: The Dawn of industry
creator_credit: Derek Stewart Productions, Gerard Bryant and British Information Services
brief_description: The history of the hovercraft’s development including an interview with its inventor, Christopher Cockerell. Various uses, both commercial and military, are shown, and some of its posible future applications are described.
creator_credit_for_label: Derek Stewart Productions, Gerard Bryant and British Information Services
